languages.text: "Твоя душа полна напрасного гнева — и жажды чужих страданий. Быть может, Сай'лантреш уже коснулась и тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Твоя душа полна напрасного гнева — и жажды чужих страданий. Быть может, Сай'лантреш уже коснулась и тебя".

languages.text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."
languages.original_text: "Твоя душа полна напрасного гнева — и жажды чужих страданий. Быть может, Сай'лантреш уже коснулась и тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."
"Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."
"Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."
"Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

languages.text: 「あなたの魂は無価値な怒りと…他者の苦しみへの渇望で満ちている。おそらくあなたにも、すでにセランスレッシュの手が及んでいる」
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの魂は無価値な怒りと…他者の苦しみへの渇望で満ちている。おそらくあなたにも、すでにセランスレッシュの手が及んでいる」

languages.text: “你的灵魂中充满了狂躁的愤怒，以及对他人痛苦的渴望。或许赛·兰斯雷什也已经在你身上留下了她的印记。”
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: “你的灵魂中充满了狂躁的愤怒，以及对他人痛苦的渴望。或许赛·兰斯雷什也已经在你身上留下了她的印记。”

languages.text: «Tu alma está llena de furia malograda y apetito por el sufrimiento ajeno. Tal vez Sai'lanthresh también haya tocado tu ser».
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: «Tu alma está llena de furia malograda y apetito por el sufrimiento ajeno. Tal vez Sai'lanthresh también haya tocado tu ser».

languages.text: "Eure Seele ist voller verschwendetem Zorn – und dem Hunger auf das Leid anderer. Vielleicht hat Sai'lanthresh Euch auch bereits berührt."
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Seele ist voller verschwendetem Zorn – und dem Hunger auf das Leid anderer. Vielleicht hat Sai'lanthresh Euch auch bereits berührt."

languages.text: « Votre âme est remplie de colère futile et de sadisme. Je me demande si Sai'lanthresh ne vous a pas déjà {mf|marqué|marquée}, vous aussi. »
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: « Votre âme est remplie de colère futile et de sadisme. Je me demande si Sai'lanthresh ne vous a pas déjà {mf|marqué|marquée}, vous aussi. »

languages.text: "Ruhun, nafile bir öfkeyle ve başkalarının ızdırabına karşı duyduğu açlıkla dolu. Belki de Sai'lanthresh'in dokunuşu seni çoktan bulmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Your soul is full of wasted rage — and hunger for others' suffering. Perhaps Sai'lanthresh has already laid her touch upon you too."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhun, nafile bir öfkeyle ve başkalarının ızdırabına karşı duyduğu açlıkla dolu. Belki de Sai'lanthresh'in dokunuşu seni çoktan bulmuştur."
